item.title: Contact
About This Site
item.description: This is a blog in search of a purpose. In life I’m exploring the question, “what matters now?” and this blog will jibe with each change in the journey. I’ve been starting with a manifesto for myself, based on exploring what matters to me. On a trail run these words came to me. I’m considering them my manifesto for the moment. I move because if I’m standing still, I’m dying. I create, as my soul knows no better way to be free.
